articles.author: April Roach
articles.title: Rupert Murdoch’s property group REA ends chase to buy Rightmove after multiple rejected offers - CNBC
articles.description: Rupert Murdoch's Australian property listing firm REA Group said Monday it would no longer seek to buy UK property portal Rightmove.
articles.content:
LONDON Rupert Murdoch's Australian property firm REA Group said Monday it would no longer seek to buy the U.K.'s Rightmove after the property portal rejected a fourth takeover proposal.
